title: 114_hr785
content: Federal Employee Pension Fairness Act of 2015 Repeals provisions requiring federal employees, including foreign service employees,nbsp, who began service after 2012nbsp, to pay an increased contribution (4.4)nbsp. For funding their annuities under the Federal Employees Retirement System. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) treat certain foreign corporations managed and controlled primarily in the United States as domestic corporations for US tax purposes, and (2)nbsp, revise rules for the taxation of inverted corporations .
